trans-unit.source: Defines the base class for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package serialization policies.
This class is abstract.
Packaging policy classes provide methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different types of parts in an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
When overridden in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.BasePackagingPolicy"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> object.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, acquires an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> with a specified resource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)].
The resource [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> resource stream to acquire.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] resource stream for the with the specified resourceID.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, acquires a resource stream for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the object.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets a list of strings, each expressing a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> element.
An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> of <xref:System.String> objects that represent the linkable targets for a page.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current page.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current page.
When overridden in a derived class, returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed document that is processing.
The <xref:System.Uri> of the current document.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page that is processing.
The <xref:System.Uri> of the current page.
When overridden in a derived class, writes a print ticket to a package or to a part of the package.
This method does not validate or modify the specified `printTicket` for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.

If necessary, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is specific to the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> and is valid for a specified printer.
An object that provides information about how a print job prints.
When overridden in a derived class, performs any required maintenance tasks before the page is committed, for example, flushes streams.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to some internal or external resource.

For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
A name for the relationship.
When overridden in a derived class, adds a relationship from the current page to a font.

For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] relationship parts in packages, see chapter 1 of the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the font.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the resource that is released.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> object.

When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsResourceStream"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> object.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, releases the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
